name: Silver Arrow (Avatar Games)
description:
In this arrow game, you don't throw the arrow, you control it directly.

A  < - > D (or arrow keys) to move

avoid the obstacles, get to the target, simple, right? WRONG!

total of 4 levels

this game is doable lol

Jules Andrault: Art And Levels 3 and 4.

Antonin Stern (aka SternGames): everything else.
